contentrichtext.text: [[File:Map.Kusunoki-Town.Yamaguchi.PNG|thumb|Kusunoki in Yamaguchi Prefecture]] {{nihongo|'''Kusunoki'''|楠町|Kusunoki-chō}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Asa District, Yamaguchi|Asa District]], [[Yamaguchi Prefecture|Yamaguchi]], [[Japan]]. On November 1, 2004 Kusunoki was merged with the city of [[Ube, Yamaguchi|Ube]] and no longer exists as an independent entity. As of 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 7,412 and a [[population density|density]] of 96.23 persons per km². The total area was 77.02 km². ==External links== * [http://www.city.ube.yamaguchi.jp/english Official website for Ube City] [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Yamaguchi Prefecture]] {{Yamaguchi-geo-stub}}
